## Post-Install Setup

1. Run `npx convex dev` to start the Convex dev server and get your deployment URL.

2. Set environment variables in the Convex dashboard (Settings > Environment Variables):
   - `AUTH_RESEND_KEY` - Your Resend API key (required for email verification/reset)
   - `AUTH_EMAIL_FROM` - Sender email address (optional, defaults to onboarding@resend.dev)
   - `AUTH_GITHUB_ID` / `AUTH_GITHUB_SECRET` - GitHub OAuth credentials (optional)
   - `AUTH_GOOGLE_ID` / `AUTH_GOOGLE_SECRET` - Google OAuth credentials (optional)

3. For OAuth providers, configure callback URLs in their dashboards:
   - GitHub: `https://<your-convex-url>/api/auth/callback/github`
   - Google: `https://<your-convex-url>/api/auth/callback/google`
